message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your perspective, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $95 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $110. I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my current budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
